channel.title: Personal on Everyone Has a Story
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Everyone Has a Story

item.title: Static file blog using web based CMS
item.description: So this is an update post, to summarize things which are going on around. So a few days back I was working on a solution so that I could keep that blog updated. As this is a not-self deployable blog I actually need to deploy changes. Somebody would say instead of taking so much efforts to deploy a single post you could have set up a WordPress blog which has an awesome app to add post, n number of themes, plugins, etc.
